meanings.sent1: The pressing issue needed to be solved right away.
meanings.sent2: The doctor had to attend to the pressing matter immediately.
meanings.sent3: The pressing need for more cookies was evident in the empty jar.
meanings.sent4: Her pressing desire to travel the world consumed her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The pressing deadline loomed over them like a dark cloud.

meanings.definition: The act of applying pressure to something.
meanings.sent1: Using pressing on the stamp made a clear imprint.
meanings.sent2: The pressing of the button activated the machine.
meanings.sent3: The pressing of the doorbell startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: The pressing of the keys on the piano created a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The pressing of the brakes stopped the car just in time.

meanings.definition: A machine or device used to apply pressure.
meanings.sent1: The pressing was used to flatten the clothes.
meanings.sent2: The tailor used a pressing to create crisp seams.
meanings.sent3: The pressing in the kitchen helped make delicious paninis.
meanings.sent4: The pressing in the factory ensured precise assembly of parts.
meanings.sent5: The pressing in the workshop helped shape the metal into intricate designs.
